Sentencas: Yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) is the key material for an electrolyte of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Preparation of a Nanoscale/SOFC-Grade Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Material: A Quasi-Optimization of the Hydrothermal Coprecipitation Process

Sentencas: In order to prepare a nanoscale/SOFC-grade 8YSZ material, the hydrothermal coprecipitation process is intensively investigated for process improvement and product identification.
Titulo: Preparation of a Nanoscale/SOFC-Grade Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Material: A Quasi-Optimization of the Hydrothermal Coprecipitation Process

Sentencas: From the characterization results of the 8YSZ product, the operation conditions were selected for process optimization.
Titulo: Preparation of a Nanoscale/SOFC-Grade Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Material: A Quasi-Optimization of the Hydrothermal Coprecipitation Process

Sentencas: The criteria used in optimization condition determination were the reproducibility of the 8YSZ product and the particle size, the crystallinity, as well as the operation simplicity.
Titulo: Preparation of a Nanoscale/SOFC-Grade Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Material: A Quasi-Optimization of the Hydrothermal Coprecipitation Process

Sentencas: Experimental results showed that a nanoscale/SOFC-grade 8YSZ powder was directly prepared.
Titulo: Preparation of a Nanoscale/SOFC-Grade Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Material: A Quasi-Optimization of the Hydrothermal Coprecipitation Process

Sentencas: The quasi-optimum conditions of the process are proposed.
Titulo: Preparation of a Nanoscale/SOFC-Grade Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Material: A Quasi-Optimization of the Hydrothermal Coprecipitation Process
